articles.description: The moon has resources like rare earth elements and helium-3. But unfettered mining could be very bad news for scientific research, astronomers warn.
articles.content:
Mining the moon could be a huge money-making industry in the future.Yunus Turkyilmaz/Anadolu via Getty Images
  • Moon mining could become a multibillion-dollar industry.
